description:
Download images from your camera's SD card without the use of a PC or any USB cables, and view them in the webOS Photos & Videos application. 

The AirStash downloader is designed to download the contents of a SD card that is connected to a webOS device via an AirStash Pocket Media Server.  The AirStash Pocket Media Server presents itself as a standard HTTP server, so this downloader should be able to also download content from a variety of other web sites, but this functionality is untested, unsupported, and may not work.

The AirStash downloader is optimized downloading photos from a digital camera, but is capable of mirroring the contents of any SD card served by an AirStash Pocket Media Server.   Mimetype and file extension filters can be used to keep the downloader from wasting time on downloading files that will be pruned.

NOTE: I am not in any way affiliated with Wearable Inc., the creator of the AirStash Pocket Media Service.  See http://www.airstash.com/ for more information.
